insights.content: This marketing proposal shows strong strategic alignment with DAO growth objectives. The budget allocation is reasonable and targets high-impact channels. Expected ROI of 3.2x based on historical data.
Low financial risk. The requested 50K USDC represents 1.8% of total treasury. Current burn rate can accommodate this expense without affecting runway significantly.
RECOMMENDED: Strong business case with measurable KPIs. Marketing spend aligns with growth phase requirements and community expansion goals.

recommendations.title: High Engagement Detected
recommendations.description: Proposal PROP-003 showing 40% higher engagement than average. Julia recommends expediting the voting process.

recommendations.title: Treasury Optimization Alert
recommendations.description: Risk Calculator suggests diversifying 15% of USDC into yield-bearing assets. Potential 4.2% APY increase.

recommendations.title: Voting Pattern Analysis
recommendations.description: Advisor detected unusual voting patterns on treasury proposals. Recommending enhanced due diligence.
